apps.name: RedditFilter
apps.subtitle: Filter out unwanted content from your Reddit feed. Configurable from in-app settings
apps.localizedDescription: - RedditFilter & RedditSideloadFix are made by u/level3tjg!!! - Filter out unwanted content from your Reddit feed. Configurable from in-app settings. - Requires iOS 14.0 or later. - Source code: https://github.com/level3tjg/RedditFilter https://github.com/level3tjg/RedditSideloadFix
apps.versionDescription:
# RedditFilter v2025.37.0-1.1.8

## Changes

- Fix app crash (@NicholasBly)
- Fix ad comments showing under posts (@Laitinlok)
- Fix popular feed not showing with recommendations disabled
- Move RedditFilter settings to the user drawer / side bar (accessed by tapping the profile picture in the top right)

## SHA256

- `1e33615cc37168e84256fd6c487a77cf8b11fe187532daf7331b707b664c07e3`  packages/RedditFilter_2025.37.0-1.1.8.ipa
- `1aabd2f0656e6ec4b26fa38f4b5e10bb2d4465c0c6e087e3d57da57a06799f83`  packages/com.level3tjg.redditfilter_1.1.8_iphoneos-arm.deb
- `e871f455aa868a25a7ea1fd40ef3b19a7a7ade21aa4162e0b26d94dab9f31c12`  packages/com.level3tjg.redditfilter_1.1.8_iphoneos-arm64.deb

apps.name: BTLoader (Kettu Discord mod)
apps.versionDescription:
⚠️ | Download the latest testing build here.

⚠️ **_PS: Just reminding everyone again. This testing release still has the known issue with plugin settings pages on some plugins. I know some of you have been asking for a newer version anyway. So I put together this testing build for you once again._** ⚠️

## Downloads

- **bound.ipa**: BTLoader with Bound name and icon
- **discord.ipa**: BTLoader with original Discord name and icon
- **DEB**: Rootless package for jailbroken devices

## Versions

- Discord: v315.0
- BTLoader: v1.0.2

## Features

- TrollStore compatibility  
- Optimized for size and performance
